description: This Java source file defines the class MockRemoteCellModemCluster, which extends MockCluster. It models a mock cluster for a remote cell modem, including attributes and behaviors for simulated power status management within a test environment.
external_methods: addMfgAttribute(int manufacturerId, int attributeId, DataType dataType)

classes.name: MockRemoteCellModemCluster
classes.description: A mock class representing a remote cell modem cluster with power status attributes for testing purposes.

methods.name: MockRemoteCellModemCluster
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the cluster with EUI-64, endpoint ID, and sets up manufacturing attributes.

methods.name: getAttributeData
methods.description: Returns attribute data based on the provided AttributeInfo object, particularly handling power status.

methods.name: setModemPowerOn
methods.description: Sets the power status of the modem and reports the attribute change.
